channel.title: Updated site
channel.description:
That Armenian guy contacted me and he asked me to add the categories when you click on the buttons.
I just finished doing them, tell me what you think/what could be done better.
[size=2em][b]If you're planning to write anything about the widgets, don't write at all![/b][/size]
Also, the stuff I've put in the categories are things that need to get replaced by real data later.
www.vreg.comli.com
